name: Dick Wilde
description: Those pesky swamp critters are at it again! Scarin’ off all the good folk who just want to go huntin’ and fishin’ on their lakes and lagoons! We’re talking piranhas, eels, ‘gators - you name it! There’s even been talk of a giant mutated Turtle on the loose!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 4790K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 11 GB available space Sound Card: Any
